overview: Aging German boxer JÃ¼rgen "The Rock" Hartenstein was once a middleweight champion. With no manager standing behind him, he is forced to train in city parks and in a dark, seedy attic in Munich with his African trainer, Markus Kone. Every week he phones matchmakers in the U.S., because he has a dream: he wants to make a comeback.
title: The Comeback
